name: Putter Precision
description:
Made for the wowie jam 3.0.

In this backwards golf game, failure is progress! You have to get as close to the hole as possible without going in. Compete in local multiplayer, and psych out your friends and family to win!

CONTROLS

WASD to control the camera

SPACE to swing back your putter, and release to hit

Press the "lock in" button to confirm your position. This will stop other players from knocking you around, but you won't be able to take your turn for the rest of the round.
